content: for pattern support please go to the questions thread here 1 **aug 2015 - czech version available ** thank you janadressler 2 **feb 2014 - hungarian version available ** special thanks to rita szinreszin **feb 2014 - french and italian version available ** thank you audrey audrey51 and mirella mirella **decrease 2013 - german version available ** thank you sandra sandrastrickt and claudia fuzzele paulie is a sweet little cardi worked seamless from top down additional materials 5 buttons markers holder or waste yarn tapestry needle finished bust measurements 78 86 96 106 cm 1 https //www ravelry com/discuss/designs-by-isabell-kraemer/3186949/1-25 2 http //www ravelry com/people/janadressler
